Porrith Suong

I am currently an undergraduate going into my 4th year studying Computer Science at the City College of New York. I am a game developer and a tinkerer so I'm usually messing around in Unity pushing its limits. On my spare time, aside from enjoying a game or two, I enjoy reading historical fiction and watching streams to relax.

Additionally, I founded my own company initialPrefabs, where we create custom game development tools for other game development companies. We work closely with other companies in order to achieve their products quicker.
